text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Reached my 5 PM quota. Continuing to the next training after a 10-minute break.

text_block_list.name: Honest Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: E-Excuse me... Are you Mihono Bourbon?
It was a normal day of training when a lone horse girl galloped up to Mihono Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Honest Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry for interrupting... I know you're always doing such tough trainings, so...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Worry not. I'm open to 'conversation.' What did you want to discuss?

text_block_list.name: Honest Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Umm, so... You used to do short races, right? I'm just impressed that you managed to do so well in a medium distance race!
That girl looks quite excited. Mihono Bourbon on the other hand is staring at her motionlessly.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: What is it you're trying to achieve by telling me that?

text_block_list.name: Honest Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I concluded that you must have some sort of reason to reach out to me during my break.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: A question, inspection, confirmation, et cetera. What would be the reason for you reaching out to me?

text_block_list.name: Honest Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: R-Reason...?
As the girl was thinking over Mihono Bourbon's question, her face turned a little red.

text_block_list.name: Honest Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Sorry, I didn't have a particular reason, I just wanted to chat for a bit... I guess I interrupted you after all, so I'll be going!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: That's not what I...
The girl trots away. Mihono Bourbon's only movement comes from her eyes as they follow after the girl.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I am currently analyzing for possible counter- measures for my inability to reach my target parameters, a.k.a. 'failure.'

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Parameters like expression and tone of voice, taken from my data log that are useful for achieving 'proper communication.'
At least she's self-aware... So she wants to get better at socializing and having conversations...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: My parents ordered me to improve my social skills.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I spent my childhood training with my father, so I never interacted with other horse girls of my age.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Thus, my parents grew worried about my social skills when it became clear I was going to Tracen Academy.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: They told me to take great care to interact with my classmates and make friends.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: They are right. Good social skills are a necessity for horse girls. We need it for interviews and interacting with fans.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: In order to fulfill my parents' order, I created new parameters. I have set my objective to actively start conversations.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: However, the parameters have decreased slightly since school started. Extrapolating the data, it would seem impossible to fulfill my objective at this rate.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Today, I tried a new input technique that I researched: "asking about uncertanties." Yet, the girl just left...
I can tell she gives it her all, but she seems to be misinterpreting things a little...
Would parents who love their daughter really give such mechanical orders as 'interact with others' just to have her improve her social skills?
I told her that her parents probably just wanted her to have a fun time with her friends at school. She just stared at me in confusion.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry, but I don't understand what you mean. My database does not contain any knowledge on this subject.
I'm trying to explain that doing things with friends creates valuable experiences and memories, when suddenly...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Break time exceeded by 20 seconds. Returning to training as soon as possible.
...She sprints back to the racecourse.
As a horse girl, she is growing very well. Yet she continues to be somewhat out of touch with the world, for better or worse.
As she continues to run towards the horizon, I can only wish that one day, she will understand what her parents really meant.
